title: WTB: 1911 Obak Weaver and E94 Lajoie

posts.post_title: WTB: 1911 Obak Weaver and E94 Lajoie
posts.post_content: Looking for an Obak Weaver in PSA or SGC 3 or better and a E94 Lajoie in PSA or SGC 3 or better also.  Any help would be appriciated.  Thanks in advance... [url]joel.tschantz@savageandassociates.com[/url]
